events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where my vehicle collided with another car at the intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under auto accident based on the description of the car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim and will contact the claimant shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident and have started processing it.
Please provide the police report and photographs of your car showing the damage from the collision.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including the police report and images of the damaged vehicle.
An investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has commenced to verify reported details.
The investigation confirmed the claimantâ€™s version of events, identifying the other driver at fault in the collision.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover repairs and related expenses for your auto accident claim.
The customer expressed appreciation for the clear communication and fair settlement proposal offered.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and the settlement amount has been officially authorized.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement for your car collision claim was successfully processed today.
The claim file has been closed following payment issuance and confirmation from the claimant of receipt.
All records related to this auto accident claim have been archived as per policy retention guidelines.
